Package it.polimi.model

Class PlayerBoard

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.model.PlayerBoard
  • public class PlayerBoard
extends java.lang.Object
    The type Player board.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      PlayerBoard()
      Instantiates a new Player board, setting ammo, board value and number of deaths to the start value.

    • Constructor Detail

      • PlayerBoard

        public PlayerBoard()
        Instantiates a new Player board, setting ammo, board value and number of deaths to the start value. Instantiates two ArrayList of Color player for the damages and marks, an ArrayList of weapon card and an ArrayList of power up card.

      • manageAmmoCard

        public void manageAmmoCard​(AmmoCard ammoCard)
        Manages the draft of ammo card, increasing the fields of ammo and adding to the list of power up, if is present, the power up shown in the ammo card drawn
        Parameters:
        ammoCard - the ammo card drawn by the player.

        Parameters:
        ammoToDecrease - colored ammo will be removed.

      • increaseDamages

        public void increaseDamages​(java.util.ArrayList<EnumColorPlayer> damages)

        Parameters:
        damages - list of damages of the player's color who did the damage.

      • resetDamage

        public void resetDamage()
        Resets damage in the player board.

      • increaseMarks

        public void increaseMarks​(EnumColorPlayer mark)
        Increases marks of the marked player, adding a single mark of the player's color who made the mark. Increases marks of the marked player only if, the number of marks of the specified color(the parameter's color), is less then three.
        Parameters:
        mark - mark of the player's color who made a mark.

      • increaseMarks

        public void increaseMarks​(java.util.ArrayList<EnumColorPlayer> marks)
        Increases marks of the marked player, adding multiple marks of the player's color who made the marks. The marks of the marked player can be increased until reaching the maximum value of three for each colors.
        Parameters:
        marks - list of marks of the player's color who made the marks.

      • shiftMarks

        public void shiftMarks​(EnumColorPlayer colorOfMark)
        Shifts all the occurrences of one color from the list of marks, to the list of damages.
        Parameters:
        colorOfMark - color of marks to shift from the list of marks to the list of damages.

      • getWeaponToCharge

        public int colorOccurrenceInDamages​(EnumColorPlayer colorPlayer)
        Counts the number of occurrences of one color in the list of damages.
        Parameters:
        colorPlayer - color we want to know the number of occurrences.
        Returns:
        the number of occurrences of the given color.

      • isColorInMarks

        public boolean isColorInMarks​(EnumColorPlayer color)
        Verifies if one color is present in the list of marks.
        Parameters:
        color - color we want to know if is present.
        Returns:
        true if the color is present, false otherwise.
